Package de.hshl.obj.loader.materials

Classes which are used to represent the MTL file after loading.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Material
    Contains colors, textures, and more properties found in MTL files.
    RGB
    Store colors as a combination of red, green, and blue.
    Texture
    Contains the path to an image file and options on how to display the image.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Material.IlluminationModel
    What mode this Material should be rendered in.
    Texture.Channel
    An image channel which can be selected.
    Texture.ReflectionMapType
    The type of the reflection map.

Package de.hshl.obj.loader.materials Description

Classes which are used to represent the MTL file after loading.
Author:
Johannes Vollmer
